message: I am the new Feygard bridge guard. Har har. We do not let beggars through, right? Come back, if you have more gold with you.
I am the new Feygard bridge guard. Har har. Give me your gold.

replies.text: Ok, here you have 50 pieces of gold. Let me pass now.
Come and try to get it.
Hm, I will think about your offer.

message:
[Gold taken]
Very good. But I need more.

replies.text: Of course. Here you have another 50 pieces of gold.
Enough now!
Hm, I will think about your offer.

message: Sorry, the road to Feygard is closed until further notice.

replies.text: Oh? Is it the fog that is the problem?

message: Yes. Several men got lost already and never reappeared. There is no way through.
Welcome! Nice to see you again.
Good morning! Did you here the music last night? I think it came from the castle.
What does a kid like you doing all alone on the road?

replies.text: I am looking for my brother Andor. You have not seen him by chance?
I am tired and hungry. Do you have a place to rest, please?
None of your business.

message: No, sorry. We seldom see strangers in the area. But you could ask at Guynmart Castle. Just follow the road to the north, you can't miss it.

replies.text: Guynmart Castle? I never heard of it yet. Please tell me more.

message: Our land belongs to Guynmart Castle, but old Guynmart is a friendly and rightious man. He never takes too much from us.

replies.text: N

message: Young Lady Hannah of Guynmart Castle often comes to visit us. A lovely girl she is. But she has not been here for a week now. I wonder if everything is all right.

replies.text: N

message: I have too much work to do now. But maybe you could have a look if everything is in order with her?

replies.text: Yes, of course. I will come back and tell you.
No, sorry. I have to press on again. Bye.
I will go tomorrow. But now I am tired and hungry. Do you have a place to rest, please?

message: Yes of course. Go inside, there is some food left, and some cushions in the corner behind the oven. I will join you later.

replies.text: Great. Thank you.

message: Hi! Any news from Guynmart castle?

replies.text: Oh yes, it is a long story. Maybe I could stay overnight and tell you all in detail ...
Yes, but I want to know more of it before I start to tell you.

message: With pleasure. Just go inside and make yourself comfortable in the corner behind the oven. We will talk when my work is done.

replies.text: Great. Thank you.

message: Grrrrrr
Hello stranger. Who are you and where are you going?

replies.text: I am $playername and come from the castle.

message: From the castle? You are not using the normal way.

replies.text: You are right. I had a misunderstanding with Unkorh the steward and he threw me out from the north wall. Just now I am looking for a way back.

message: You have been kicked out? And still want to go back? You must explain that.

replies.text: I spoke to Lady Hannah there. She bade me to find her betrothed who is missed for a week already.

message:
Lovis is missed? That is bad news.
But where are my manners? I am questioning you and didn't even introduce myself. I am Norgothla, chief of Guynmarts personal garde. And these are my men.

replies.text: Nice to meet you, Norgothla.

message: Well, you say Lovis is missed? I wonder if we should have a look at the castle? But we are ordered to stay here.

replies.text: Ordered?

message: I take orders only from my Lord Guynmart himself. And he told me and my men to get to this clearing and wait for him.

replies.text: That is strange. I heard at the castle that Lord Guynmart was uproad for a week now. And I heard other things I dare not tell.

message: You must tell me all that you know or think to know. I promise you have nothing to fear.

replies.text: I heard Unkorh saying that Guynmart is imprisoned in the dungeons. And Unkorh also wants to marry Lady Hannah.

message: Indeed! These are serious accusations. I hope you can prove it.

replies.text: How can I? You may go to the castle and look for yourself.

message:
Now I am really curious what is going on in the castle. But unfortunately Guynmarts order was very clear - I myself and all my men should be wait for him on this clearing.
I can't leave just for the words of a kid.

replies.text: And let Unkorhs dark plans be fulfilled? Let Guynmart probably die?
Maybe I could go back and bring some evidence?

message: Maybe you could go back to the castle and bring some evidence?

replies.text: With pleasure, if this helps to believe me.

message:
By doing this, you take a great burden from my heart. So I get to know the doings at the castle but don't have to disobey my lords order.
Just go on, the path is not difficult to find.

replies.text: Ok, I will hurry.

message: Halt! Talk to Norgothla before you walk around here!
Go away, kid.
Go away, kid. I am depressed.

replies.text: N

message: They have all gone and forgot me here. Sigh.

replies.text: Oh my.

message: Go away, kid.
Hey! You are the first one that found the way to my clearing!

replies.text: N

message: I like this place very much. Each time I return here, I get a surprise.
Cool place here, isn't it?
This way I like the clearing best.
A little too hot for my taste.
I do not know what that means?
Strange this.
Back to normal.
I see you are coming around. Do you want to climb up to me?

replies.text: Oh yes. Could you let the rope down?
No, thank you.

message: Of course. There. But I must leave now in a hurry.

replies.text: Great! I'll get up now.

message: Grumble ... grumble ...

replies.text: He seem to speak too often to his dogs only.

message: Grrumble ... grrrrumble ...

replies.text: Maybe he does not like sheeps beeing killed?

message: GRRRUMMBLE!!!

replies.text: Obviously he does not like sheeps beeing killed.

message: Baah!

replies.text: Baah!
You look tasty ...

message: Neigh
The left beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: No, the right beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: Nonsense, the left beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: The right beetle will win.

replies.text: N

message: Hey, come and join our beetle battle.
Sob

replies.text: Don't cry, little one. What's your name?

message: Sob ... Stuephant ... sob

replies.text: There now. What's the matter?

message: I have lost my five best marbles!

replies.text: Oh dear, That is all? I will find them for you.
Look, here I have a nice Teddy Bear for you.
The quicker I leave, the sooner I have silence and peace again.

message: Great - thank you!

replies.text: Much better. Now tell me about your marbles.

message: I have lost them here in the yard or in the acre over there.

replies.text: N

message: Five beautiful marbles. Maybe you must look more than once at a place, because they are so small.

replies.text: Be happy again, I won't need long.

message: Sob ... you don't find my marbles either ... sob

replies.text: I didn't give up yet. Just you wait

message: Thank you again for finding my marbles.

My lost marbles! All five! Great, thank you!
[Stuephant takes the marbles]

replies.text: You're welcome.

message: I found a green marble!

replies.text: N

message: I found a red marble!

replies.text: N

message: I found a pink marble!

replies.text: N

message: Wow - a golden marble!

replies.text: N

message: I found a pearl white marble!

replies.text: N

message: That was it, I found them all. Stuephant will be happy.

replies.text: I will go to him now.

message: Oh, a visitor. Come closer. Do not be afraid of me.

replies.text: I am not afraid. What happened to you?
Eh, I have to go.

message: Oh, it is you again. I am delighted!

replies.text: De-lighted indeed. You might need anything?

message: It happend in the mines of Mount Galmore. Don't ask any further, I do not want to recall the remembrance. It was horrible.

replies.text: N

message: When I came returned here at last, people started to avoid me then, whispering behind my back. I got very lonely.

replies.text: N

message: I got enough of all these anxious, disturbed looks, so I went up here on this lonely hill.

replies.text: N

message: From time to time a friendly soul brings some food, but no one stays for long. I do notice that uphill their pace is much slower than back downhill.

replies.text: N

message: Do you bring bread and wine together with my favorite cheddar?

replies.text: Yes, finally I got it. I hope the cheddar is still fresh after the long journey.
No, not yet.

message: Do you bring bread, cheese and wine?

replies.text: Yes, here you are. Enjoy it!
No, not yet.

message: No, thank you.

replies.text: N

message: Just now my supply of bread is already running out again. And eggs I haven't see for such a long time...

replies.text: That can be helped. I could spare 2 loafs of breads.
I could give you 3 eggs.
I could spare bread, some cheese and a bottle of red wine.
Unfortunately I have nothing I could give you.
Sad for you. I have to go now. Bye.

message: Thank you! Thank you very much!

replies.text: N

message: Would it be really outrageous if I asked you to fulfill my heart's desire?

replies.text: Sorry, I really must go now.
Just say it. What can I do for you?

message: I long for a meal with bread and cheese and a good bottle of wine. Oh, what would I give for that?

replies.text: Here I have bread, some cheese and a bottle of red wine.
Really? That is all? I will come back soon.
Be content with what you got, you greedy old man.

message: Oh yes - you get the best cheese in Charwood, if you don't mind!

replies.text: Charwood? I never heard of.
Charwood? That's not right next door ...

message: What a feast! I have no words to thank you!

replies.text: N

message: So take this ring as a token of my gratitude. Certain beings in the cellars of Guynmart Castle will not harm you if they see my ring on your finger.

replies.text: The ring looks interesting. Thank you.
N

message: Eh ...

replies.text: Yes?

message: now ...

replies.text: Oh dear! Just say it. What's up?

message: The cheese from Charwood - it was ok. But it was not their best cheese, you know?

replies.text: Not?

message: Their Cheddar is a dream! But they sell it only, when you ask for it explicitly. Sorry, I should have told you.

replies.text: No problem. I just go again.
Yes, you should have told me. Now I won't run all the way again.

message: Great! I will wait for you.
Cheddar! I still can't belive!

replies.text: N

message: (eating)

replies.text: N

message: It was nice to talk to you. Come again, as often as you like!

replies.text: Yes, we will meet again.

message: $playername monument - not bad.
